title: OAuth 2.0 and OpenID Connect
content:
Module 6, Lesson 4: OAuth 2.0 and OpenID Connect

Introduction

This lesson covers OAuth 2.0 and OpenID Connect, a core topic in Authentication & Security. Mastering this area will help you build reliable, scalable, and maintainable web applications.

Key Concepts

1. Fundamentals

Understanding the foundational principles of OAuth 2.0 and OpenID Connect ensures you can apply them correctly in a variety of real-world scenarios. Always prefer clarity over cleverness.

2. Practical Application

Theory must translate into working code. In Authentication & Security, every concept has direct practical implications for how you architect, test, and deploy applications.

3. Common Pitfalls

Awareness of common mistakes in OAuth 2.0 and OpenID Connect helps you avoid costly bugs and security vulnerabilities. Review real-world examples and practise defensive coding techniques.

4. Best Practices

Industry best practices evolve constantly. Keep up with community standards, read production post-mortems, and participate in code reviews to sharpen your skills in Authentication & Security.

Summary

You have completed OAuth 2.0 and OpenID Connect in Module 6. Continue to the next lesson to build further expertise in Authentication & Security.
